heading: How are top-performing companies extracting value from data while building customer trust?
paragraphs: We spoke with more than 13,000 C-suite executives worldwide about data, the value they derive from it, and what it takes to lead in a world awash with data.

Learn how an elite group of enterprises—we call them Torchbearers—are commanding data and trust to their spectacular advantage in the 20th Edition IBM Global C-suite Study, "Build Your Trust Advantage: Leadership in the era of data and AI everywhere."

The C-suite Study can help you provide new value to clients and discover new client opportunities. Seventy percent of the IBMers we surveyed who used the C-suite Study program said it deepens client relationships, and 46 percent said it leads to new business opportunities.

We have a suite of sales enablement materials you can leverage to show your clients why they need data-driven leadership strategies. Take them through the C-suite Digital Assessment to see how they compare to surveyed companies. They get personalized feedback at the end.
